entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:38 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
